name: Professional Seminar
long_desc: This weekly, 3unit seminar is designed to give professional and technical writing majors an overview of possible career and internship options and ways to pursue their professional interests. Each session will feature guest presenters who are professionals working in diverse communicationsrelated fields such as web design, journalism, public relations, corporate and media relations, technical writing, medical communications, and working for nonprofits. The visiting professionals talk about their own and related careers, show samples of their work, and answer student questions. The course is required for firstyear MAPW students and is open to all English undergraduates, who are urged to participate in their sophomore or junior years to explore options for internships and careers.
